transcript:
and had spent that happy day in inactivity, was all the more depressed. 
"Come here, Wost6v. Let's dwink to dwown our gwief!" shouted Denisov, who had settled down by the roadside with a flask and some food. 
The officers gathered round Denfsov's can- teen, eating and talking. 
"There! They are bringing another!" cried one of the officers, indicating a captive French 
dragoon who was being brought in on foot by two Cossacks. 
One of them was leading by the bridle a fine large French horse
